fields.description: Displays the billing address in an easy to read format.
fields.formula:
Billing_Address_Line_1__c +
IF(!ISBLANK(Billing_Address_Line_2__c), BR() + Billing_Address_Line_2__c  + BR(), BR()) +
Billing_Address_City__c + ", " + TEXT(Billing_Address_State__c) + " " + Billing_Address_Postal_Code__c  + BR() +
TEXT(Billing_Address_Country__c)

picklistValues.description: Customer has paid but not installed
Customer has paid and installed, deal is completed
Used when creating an Opportunity from the Wizard. If the credit fails, Failed Credit Stage will be used to auto populate the new opportunity
when call to lifelock fails or response is false.
Solar.
This will be used for S-Docs stage to send an addendum.
Solar Project.Permit Scheduled
Solar Project.Install Scheduled For Date
Used when a customer has a credit score between 550 and 559.
The opportunity has been scheduled but has not yet been marked as won.
An opportunity has been won but has not yet been scheduled.
Opportunity has been won and the Service is pending an install
The service has been installed but is still in the three day grace period.
Opportunity is past the grace period and has been installed and functional.
Opportunity was lost during the proposal phase.
An opportunity was lost while it was in the status Won - Not Scheduled.
Opportunity lost while it was in the stage Won - Pending Install
When a service canceled within their 3 day grace period
When we are first aware of Transfer
For Solar Transfer - 2nd Milestone
for Solar Transfer

validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
 Auto_Pay__c = TRUE,
 ISPICKVAL( Invoice_Delivery_Preference__c,"print"))
validationRules.errorMessage: If Auto Pay is true then invoices can only be emailed

validationRules.description: Validates Billing Address US and Canada Zip Code
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
OR (AND(
ISPICKVAL(Billing_Address_Country__c, "US"),
NOT(REGEX(Billing_Address_Postal_Code__c, "\\d{5}(-\\d{4})?"))
), AND(
ISPICKVAL(Billing_Address_Country__c, "CA"), NOT(REGEX(Billing_Address_Postal_Code__c, "((?i)[ABCEFGHJKLMNPRSTVXY]\\d[A-Z]?\\s?\\d[A-Z]\\d)?"))
))
&& NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
validationRules.errorMessage: Billing address postal code you entered is not valid. For United States, billing code needs to be in 12345 or in 12345-6789 format. For Canada, billing code needs to be in A1B 2C3 format.

validationRules.description: JAR-3146 - If the account is locked by legal then no new opportunity can be created.
validationRules.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW() &&  (TEXT(Service__r.Legal_Restriction_Lock__c) == 'Partial Lock' || TEXT(Service__r.Legal_Restriction_Lock__c) == 'Full Lock') && ($Profile.Name == 'Customer Care' || $Profile.Name == 'Billing' || $Profile.Name == 'Customer Loyalty' || $Profile.Name == 'Account Creation' || $Profile.Name == 'Customer Solutions' || $Profile.Name == 'Special Exceptions' || $Profile.Name == 'NIS' || $Profile.Name == 'System Administrator')
validationRules.errorMessage: A service related to the account is locked by legal. If you (Vivint employee) need assistance or to update this service, please email legal@vivint.com.

validationRules.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( Service_Level__c) && (RecordType.Name = "Lifelock: New Sale" ||  RecordType.Name = "Lifelock: Upgrade/Downgrade") && IsWon
validationRules.errorMessage: You can't change the service level after an opportunity is won.

validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
Contract_Signer__c = '' 
&&
IsWon = true 
&&
PRIORVALUE(IsWon) = false
&& 
NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c)&& 
$User.Username != 'builduser@vivint.com'
validationRules.errorMessage: Can't close/won without contract signer.

validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won') &&
Special_Exception_Approved__c = false &&
NOT(ISBLANK( Approvals_Needed__c ))
&& NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
validationRules.errorMessage: This opportunity needs to be approved by special exceptions before it can be closed. Please contact Special Exceptions.

validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
ISNEW() && 
(RecordType.DeveloperName = "Internet" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "Security_Record_Type" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "Security_Business_New_Sale" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "Commercial_Fire_New_Sale" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "Security_NIS_New_Sale")
&&  
Billing_Address_Same_As_Service__c = false
&&
(
Billing_Address_Line_1__c = null ||
Billing_Address_City__c = null ||
ISPICKVAL(Billing_Address_State__c ,"") ||
ISPICKVAL(Billing_Address_Country__c, "") ||
Billing_Address_Postal_Code__c = null)
&&
NOT(
CONTAINS($User.Username, "zuoraapi") ||
CONTAINS($User.Username, "ecommapi") ||
CONTAINS($User.Username, "clickapi")
)
validationRules.errorMessage: You must provide a billing address or specify that it is the same as the Service Address.

validationRules.description: Credit_Score_Report__c must be set before opportunity can be Closed/Won
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
NOT($Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
&&
Bypass_Credit_Approved__c == false
&&
IsClosed = true 
&&
IsWon = true
&&
PRIORVALUE(IsWon) = false
&&
(
  RecordType.Name = "Security: New Sale"
  ||
  RecordType.Name = "Security: NIS New Sale"
)
&& 
ISBLANK(Credit_Score_Report__c)&&  $User.Username != 'builduser@vivint.com'
validationRules.errorMessage: Credit Score Report must be set before opportunity can be Closed/Won

validationRules.description: This validation rule requires Closed Won Solar Opportunities to have a credit score report not within the Excellent credit range for Solar.
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
AND( 
OR( 
AND( 
Credit_Score_Report__r.Range_Solar__c <> "EXCELLENT", 
Credit_Score_Report__r.Range_Solar__c <> "GOOD", 
ISPICKVAL(Credit_Score_Report__r.Type_Of_Credit_Run__c, "Regular") 
), 
ISPICKVAL(Credit_Score_Report__r.Type_Of_Credit_Run__c, "rescreen") 
), 
RecordType.Name = "Solar: New Sale", 
DATEVALUE( CreatedDate ) > DATE(2014,06,08), 
OR( 
ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), 
ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Processed") 
) 
) 
&& NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
validationRules.errorMessage: The Credit Score Report is not in the acceptable credit range for this opportunity. Please update this opportunity to Closed Lost.

validationRules.description: Locks down failed credit opportunities
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
ISCHANGED(StageName) && ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Failed Credit") && 
NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c ) && 
NOT($Setup.Bypass_Credit_Restrictions__c.Bypass_Credit__c && 
RecordType.DeveloperName = "Security_NIS_New_Sale")  
&& NOT($Permission.Modify_Failed_Credit_Opportunity ) && 
( BypassFailedCredit__c = false) && (Allow_Edit_through_Flow__c = false)
validationRules.errorMessage: You can't edit this opportunity due to failed credit. Only special exceptions or system administrator can edit this opportunity.

validationRules.description: This validation does not alllow Enduser to set stage to "Failed to Enroll" for a lifelock opportunity when there the Error message is null.
validationRules.errorConditionFormula: Error_Message__c == null  &&   ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Failed to Enroll')
validationRules.errorMessage: You can not set the stage to Failed to Enroll.

validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
(RecordType.Name = "Lifelock: New Sale" || 
RecordType.Name = "Lifelock: Upgrade/Downgrade" ) && (ISCHANGED( AccountId) || ISCHANGED (Lifelock_Contact_Name__c)) && NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
validationRules.errorMessage: You can't change account or contact once an opportunity is created.

validationRules.description: Locks the opportunity Stage Name
validationRules.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c ) && ISCHANGED( StageName ) &&  !Allow_Edit_through_Flow__c &&  !$Permission.Edit_Opportunity_Stage &&  RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Vivint_Inc_New_Sale'
validationRules.errorMessage: Sorry you can't change the Stage Name.

validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Closed Lost") &&
NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )&&
NOT(RecordType.Name = "Solar: New Sale"|| 
RecordType.Name = "Solar: Transfer") && NOT($Setup.EditWonOpportunity__c.Edit_Won_Opportunity__c)
validationRules.errorMessage: You don't have permission to edit a lost opportunity. If you think you need to modify this opportunity, contact system administrator.

validationRules.description: Allows changes to the sales credit and initial sales office fields on closed/won opportinities.
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
NOT($Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c ) && ( ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Closed Won")) && 
NOT( $Permission.Modify_Sales_Credit_and_Office_on_Oppty)  && 
(
ISCHANGED( Sales_Credit__c ) || 
ISCHANGED(Initial_Sales_Office__c )
)
validationRules.errorMessage: Only Special Exceptions and the NIS Arbitration Team may edit Sales Credit and Initial Sales Office.

validationRules.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Address_Verification_Status__c,"Verified") ||ISPICKVAL( Address_Verification_Status__c,"Bypassed")) && NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c ) &&  (RecordType.Name = "Security: Customer Moves" || RecordType.Name = "Security: Business Customer Moves")
validationRules.errorMessage: Please verify service address by clicking on "Verify Address" before closing this opportunity.

validationRules.description: Prevents changing the service address on the Opportunity after the Opportunity status has been closed won.
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
	(
		ISCHANGED( Service_Address_1__c ) ||
		ISCHANGED( Service_Address_2__c ) ||
		ISCHANGED( Service_Address_City__c ) ||
		ISCHANGED( Service_Address_State__c ) ||
		ISCHANGED( Service_Address_Postal_Code__c ) ||
		ISCHANGED( Service_Address_Country__c ) ||
		ISCHANGED( Service_Address_County__c )
	),
	NOT(ISCHANGED(StageName)),
	ISPICKVAL(StageName ,'Closed Won'),
	IF($RecordType.Name=="Security: Takeover" && NOT($Permission.Bypass_Closed_Won_Opp_Validation_for_Takeover),TRUE, FALSE), 
	NOT($Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c),
	$User.Username != 'builduser@vivint.com'
)
validationRules.errorMessage: Cannot edit Address if the Opportunity Stage is 'Closed Won'

validationRules.description: Prevents the user from changing the Office to an office that has a Status of "Pending Closure" or "Closed". (SFDC-2041)
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR(ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Office__c)),
OR(ISPICKVAL(Office__r.Status__c, "Pending Closure"), ISPICKVAL(Office__r.Status__c, "Closed")),
NOT($Profile.Name = 'System Administrator' || $Profile.Name = 'Solar - System Administrator' || $Profile.Name = 'Solar_API_User' || $Profile.Name = 'api_user' || $Permission.Solar_Validation_Rule_OPP001)
)
validationRules.errorMessage: This Office has been marked as "Pending Closure" or "Closed". Please select a different office. For questions, please contact 1Stop or Sales Leadership. [Error: OPP001]

validationRules.description: Estimated Monthly Bill for Solar must be greater then 0.  It cannot be a negative number.
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
AND( 
$RecordType.Name = "Solar: New Sale", 
(Est_Monthly_Bill_after_Solar__c  < 0), 
NOT($Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c 
))
validationRules.errorMessage: Estimated Monthly Bill for Solar must be greater then 0.  It cannot be a negative number. [Error: OPP002]

validationRules.description: Office__c must be set before opportunity can be Closed/Won
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
NOT($Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
&&
IsClosed = true 
&&
IsWon = true
&&
PRIORVALUE(IsWon) = false
&&
(
  RecordType.Name = "Security: New Sale"
  ||
  RecordType.Name = "Security: NIS New Sale"
) 
&&
ISBLANK(Office__c)&& $User.Username != 'builduser@vivint.com' && $Profile.Name != "Customer Care"
validationRules.errorMessage: Office must be set before opportunity can be Closed/Won

validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Processed') &&
NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,'Solar Processing') ||
$Profile.Name = 'Contract Processing' || $Profile.Name = 'Service Billing')
&& NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c ) && $User.Username != 'zuoraapi@vivint.com'
validationRules.errorMessage: Only contract processing and Service Billing profile users can move an opportunity to Closed Processed Stage.

validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Won') &&
$Profile.Name = 'Partners'
validationRules.errorMessage: You can't close this opportunity. Please call Vivint to proceed.

validationRules.description: Ensures that RMR field is not empty
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
NOT($Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
&&
IsClosed = true 
&&
IsWon = true
&&
PRIORVALUE(IsWon) = false
&&
(
  RecordType.Name = "Security: New Sale"
  ||
  RecordType.Name = "Security: NIS New Sale"
) 
&&
(
  ISBLANK( Recurring_Monthly_Revenue_RMR__c ) 
)&& 
$User.Username != 'builduser@vivint.com'
validationRules.errorMessage: Recurring Monthly Revenue (RMR) can't be empty.

validationRules.description: Sales_Credit__c must be set before opportunity can be Closed/Won
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
NOT($Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
&&
IsClosed = true 
&&
IsWon = true
&&
PRIORVALUE(IsWon) = false
&&
(
  RecordType.Name = "Security: New Sale"
  ||
  RecordType.Name = "Security: NIS New Sale"
) 
&&
ISBLANK( Sales_Credit__c )&&  $User.Username != 'builduser@vivint.com'
validationRules.errorMessage: Sales Credit must be set before opportunity can be Closed/Won

validationRules.description: Service Address fields must be present (Service_Address_Country__c, Service_Address_Postal_Code__c, Service_Address_State__c, Service_Address_City__c, Service_Address_1__c) before opportunity can be Closed/Won
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
NOT($Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
&&
IsClosed = true 
&&
IsWon = true
&&
PRIORVALUE(IsWon) = false
&&
(
  RecordType.Name = "Security: New Sale"
  ||
  RecordType.Name = "Security: NIS New Sale"
) 
&&
(
  ISBLANK(Service_Address_1__c) 
  ||
  ISBLANK(Service_Address_City__c) 
  ||
  ISBLANK(TEXT(Service_Address_State__c)) 
  ||
  ISBLANK(Service_Address_Postal_Code__c) 
  ||
  ISBLANK(TEXT(Service_Address_Country__c))
)&&  $User.Username != 'builduser@vivint.com'
validationRules.errorMessage: Service Address must be complete before opportunity can be Closed/Won

validationRules.description: Either the 'Billing Address Same As Service' has to be selected or the Billing Address fields have to be filled up.
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
AND(RecordTypeId = '012J0000000D3Ra',
Billing_Address_Same_As_Service__c = FALSE,
OR(Billing_Address_Line_1__c = null,
Billing_Address_City__c = null,
Billing_Address_Postal_Code__c = null,
ISBLANK(TEXT(Billing_Address_Country__c))))
validationRules.errorMessage: On New Security Opportunities, you must fill in Billing Address fields or select "Billing Address Same As Service".

validationRules.description: Validates Service Address US and Canada Zip Code
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
OR (AND( 
OR(ispickval(Service_Address_Country__c, "USA"), ispickval(Service_Address_Country__c, "US")), 
NOT(REGEX(Service_Address_Postal_Code__c, "\\d{5}(-\\d{4})?")) 
), AND( 
OR(ispickval(Service_Address_Country__c, "CAN"), ispickval(Service_Address_Country__c,  "CA"), ispickval(Service_Address_Country__c, "Canada")), 
NOT(REGEX(Service_Address_Postal_Code__c, "((?i)[ABCEFGHJKLMNPRSTVXY]\\d[A-Z]?\\s?\\d[A-Z]\\d)?")) 
))
&& NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
validationRules.errorMessage: Billing address postal code you entered is not valid. For United States, billing code needs to be in 12345 or in 12345-6789 format. For Canada, billing code needs to be in A1B 2C3 format.

validationRules.description: Prevents Solar profiles from changing the Opportunity Name.
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
Contains(RecordType.Name, "Solar") && 
ISCHANGED( Name ) && NOT($Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
validationRules.errorMessage: You cannot change the Opportunity Name.

validationRules.description: The manual Mosaic call from Opportunity via the Loan Processing team should not be run more than once
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
  PRIORVALUE(Notify_Mosaic__c) = TRUE,
  ISCHANGED(Notify_Mosaic__c)
)
validationRules.errorMessage: You cannot generate a Mosaic Opportunity more than once. Please contact your System Administrator for assistance.

validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
Special_Exception_Approved__c = true &&
ispickval (Special_Exception_Approver__c, '')
&& NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
validationRules.errorMessage: If approved by special exceptions, you'll need to indicate a special exceptions approver.

validationRules.description: Survey Status must have a value of "Pass" or "Fail" before the opportunity is Closed/Won
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
NOT($Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )
&&
IsClosed  = true 
&&
IsWon = true
&&
PRIORVALUE(IsWon) = false
&&
(
  RecordType.Name = "Security: New Sale"
  ||
  RecordType.Name = "Security: NIS New Sale"
) 
&&
NOT(ISPICKVAL(Survey_Status__c , "Pass")) 
&&
NOT(ISPICKVAL(Survey_Status__c , "Fail"))&&  $User.Username != 'builduser@vivint.com' &&  $Profile.Name != 'NIS'
validationRules.errorMessage: Survey Status must have a value of "Pass" or "Fail" before the opportunity is Closed/Won

validationRules.description: Ensures that users won't be able to modify a won opportunity if they don't have the permission to do so via custom setting.  "Ability to Edit Won Opportunity"
validationRules.errorConditionFormula:
NOT(RecordType.Name = "Lifelock: New Sale" || 
RecordType.Name = "Lifelock: Upgrade/Downgrade")&& 
NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost")) && 
ISCHANGED(StageName) && 
(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Closed Won") || 
ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Installed")) 
&& 
NOT( $Setup.Data_Loader_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c )&& 
NOT($Setup.EditWonOpportunity__c.Edit_Won_Opportunity__c) && 
NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,"Solar Processing") || $Profile.Name= "System Administrator" || $Profile.Name= "Special Exceptions" || $Profile.Name= "1Stop"|| $Profile.Name= "api_user")
validationRules.errorMessage: You don't have permission to edit a won opportunity. If you think you need to modify this opportunity, contact system administrator and have your name added to this custom setting: "Ability to Edit Won Opportunity"
